in_brief:
B. Malar is a Professor in the Department of AMCS since August 2022. She has 17 years of teaching experience and 10 years of research experience. Her research interests include Machine learning, Natural Language Processing, Data mining and Soft computing. Currently, she is working on Feature Engineering and Deep learning for NLP Applications. 

She is teaching (i) Machine Learning (ii) Natural Language Processing (iii) Data structures (iv) Advanced Data Structures and (V) Datamining
